text: khea hela nan ca tham cea keiyw kab deuxn ræk khun cng klaw theid man khux kahnd wela tang«sahrab mnusʹy læa sahrab pra kx bphithi hacy læa ha chı pen khunthrrm mi nı kar thi phwk cea khea ban thang hlang ban tæthwa khunthrrm nan khux phu thi yakerng tanghak læa phwk cea cng khea ban thang pratu ban læa phwk cea cng ya ke rng xallxh theid pheux wa phwk cea ca di rab khwam sarec
